author: Ben Cohen
title: The Rockets Have No Margin for Error Against the Warriors
text:
There has never been an NBA team assembled so carefully with another team in mind as the Houston Rockets.
They were engineered to destroy the Golden State Warriors. The Rockets werenâ€™t shy about their intentions, and that was before Houston general manager Daryl Morey publicly admitted that he was nothing short of obsessed with the reigning champions. But his fixation made sense. If they wanted to win a championship, he figured, the odds were they would have to beat a team that may turn out to be unbeatable.
